item.title: Blocked drain, 25th July
item.description:
The drain is located in the parking bay opposite the newly refurbished toilet block of Montpellier Gardens. As you can clearly see the soil debris is solid and completely blocking the drain and it's function. I believe I reported this issue almost a year ago and still it hasn't been addressed. When it rains the water is unable to drain away and creates unsafe pavement conditions due to the fact the rain water flows over the pavement creating a hazard for pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montpellier Walk, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged road surface on Gravel Walk at entrance to School Lane. Extra vehicles now using this lane are creating problems., 24th July
item.description:
Damage is adjacent to Gravel Walk/ School Lane entrance. Edges of the lane are eroding, causing damage to our vehicles who have to use as it is the only access to our homes.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gravel Walk, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
